Function Documentation

void cvl_add ( cvl_frame_t *  dst,
cvl_frame_t *  src,
const float *  summand 
)

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
src The source frame.
summand The summand (4 components).
Adds the summand to the frame src and writes the result to dst. The summand must have 4 components (one for each channel).

void cvl_mul ( cvl_frame_t *  dst,
cvl_frame_t *  src,
const float *  factor 
)

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
src The source frame.
factor The factor (4 components).
Multiplies the frame src with the factor and writes the result to dst. The factor must have 4 components (one for each channel).

void cvl_first_derivative ( cvl_frame_t *  dst,
cvl_frame_t *  src,
int  channel 
)

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
src The source frame.
channel The channel.
Computes the first derivative of the given channel (0-3) in the frame src and writes the result to dst.
The frame dst must have at least two channels. The first channel contains the first derivative in x direction, and the second channel in y direction.

void cvl_laplacian ( cvl_frame_t *  dst,
cvl_frame_t *  src,
int  channel 
)

Parameters:
dst The destination frame.
src The source frame.
channel The channel.
Computes the laplacian of the given channel (0-3) in the given frame src and writes the result to the first channel of dst.
